Candidate.Name: Gabriel Johan
Candidate.Description: - Was really nervous. - Specialises in Neurological diseases. - No close friends
Candidate.background: Lost wife and daughter in a tragic house break-in about six years ago. He finds it hard to get close to people due to this trauma. He now supports a child orphanage charity to help support children who has no family as he has lost his Spends his personal time looking at family photos and reliving his old happy memories. A man trapped in his past but with no ill-intent.

Candidate.Name: Jessica Chang
Candidate.Description: -Raised in a strict environment in China. - Workaholic and Unmarried. - Lives in a fairly small home
Candidate.background: She has a tendency to resort to violence on animals to relieve her stress. She sometimes loses control and abuses her family members when they do see each other as she can be quite fierce with them. She also obtains drugs illegally to help deal with her out breaks (ADDERAll) Her life is wasted away as all her money goes towards drugs which barely keep her stable.

Candidate.Name: Thomas Reid
Candidate.Description: - Became a composer officially at 18. - Composes music in many genres. - Has made a name for himself in the industry.
Candidate.background: Is a workaholic and very obsessive with his work to a fault. Is a perfectionist and will do any means possible to create the perfect piece, including aggressively bossing those who work under him as well as collaborators and makes everyone work overtime with no exceptions. (Is not sympathetic and understanding towards others?)

Candidate.Name: Scott MacLeod
Candidate.Description: He has a small family: his son Jeffrey (aged 11) and his wife Emma, who unfortunately passed away last year. He wants to take his kid to Evandria for a better future. His own childhood wasn't the best, and that's what drives his motives to get to Evandria, and also for his late wife. He's a bit disappointed his Diploma in Arts didn't get him very far, but he thinks that everybody should know about and appreciate Arts.

Candidate.Name: Tara Williams
Candidate.Skills: Retail shopping, schmoozing, Organising charity events
Candidate.Description: Tara comes from an extremely wealthy family. The entire Williams bloodline would buy their way to Evandria if they could. Unfortunately for the Williams' everyone has to be equally considered. In her spare time, Tara loves shopping, hosting dinner parties and even occasionaly hosting charity events. Tara is a Commerce-Law student, and in this day and age, universities and higher education has become extremely rare and reserved for the wealthier.

Candidate.Name: Landon Ortega
Candidate.Description: Landon is a young man who believes he can do anything, anything you need repaired he'll construct a way to deal with it. He's only ever worked one job in his life but his employer restricted him to working by the book to solve problems and wouldn't let him make use of his innovative ideas. He sometimes gets ahead of himself and makes unrealistic designs which may not work in practice.
Candidate.background: Although his ideas may not always seem to be grounded in real in-use solutions Landon thoroughly researchs his ideas. He makes careful calculations to reduce the risk of their failure, but without actually having tested them practically there is no absolute guarantee they will work. Taking a chance on a guy like Landon could lead to great technological advancements, but great reward only comes from taking big risks.

Candidate.Name: Asuna Touyama
Candidate.Description: Holds a criminal record which shows that she has previously committed crimes of theft. Has attended multiple sessions with a psychiatrist to deal with her ongoing anger management issues. Works dilligently and efficiently at work.

Candidate.Name: Louis Dubois
Candidate.Description: World reowned chef with multiple restaurant chains around the world Popular with the ladies Girlfriend (Miranda) died in a serial killing case recently
Candidate.background: Actually a serial killer, not satified with just killing and cooking animals He actually killed his ex girlfriend

Candidate.Name: Sara Van Haver
Candidate.Description: Sara spends all her time taking care of her 2 young children, Tommy and Lara She used to be a primary school teacher at her local school Used to be with her husband a lot, but now he's nowhere to be seen

Candidate.Name: Francis Smith
Candidate.Description: Francis is a professional software engineer, however he prefers to spend most of his time playing video games. He has shown glimpses of brilliance in his work, and has the potential to create groundbreaking products

Candidate.Name: Anzio Romano
Candidate.Description: Works at a software company as an in-house tester/debugger. Recently purchased a luxurious house, even though he doesn't seem to be making that much money as a game tester. His coworkers are saying he's hard to work with due to his condescending personality, but his close friends are saying that he takes great care of his parents. Which is the real him?
